AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ProtoBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is used for basic base building and cleaning, unable to fight.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ConstructoBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is used for more advanced building/ manufacturing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: CiviBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is a useful member of the colony, able to function as a colonist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestibot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is able to perform more complex chores than the protobot.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: DestructoBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is used for combat purposes, its a tanky fighter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: MurderBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is a more specialized shooter, takes less punishment than the Destructobot.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Female EscortBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is a more specialized melee fighter, takes less punishment than the Destructobot. They are usually used as companions and bodyguards.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Male EscortBot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This model is a more specialized melee fighter, takes less punishment than the Destructobot. They are usually used as companions and bodyguards.
